Greetings to Peruvian Foreign Minister 
    Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Peruvian counterpart Allan Wagner Tizon on the occasion of its Independence Day.
 Expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in conformity with the desire of the two peoples, the message wished him success in his responsible work.
